body_html: Sort of far, see https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/354b2f93c4e0b819fdc68c4633c9b221 for the warnings emitted for all of torch/csrc. I think we'd have to clean up all the warnings first, and spend some more time using it locally to weed out warnings that we don't want. Once we are happy with that, we could add a CI job that runs clang tidy on the user's changes.

body: Sort of far, see https://gist.github.com/goldsborough/354b2f93c4e0b819fdc68c4633c9b221 for the warnings emitted for all of `torch/csrc`. I think we'd have to clean up all the warnings first, and spend some more time using it locally to weed out warnings that we don't want. Once we are happy with that, we could add a CI job that runs clang tidy on the user's changes.
